橚字的基本解释

橚
sù
〔橚爽〕草木茂盛。
树木高：“橚矗森萃，蓊茸萧瑟。”

橚
qiū
古同“楸”，楸树。

橚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sù］
［《廣韻》息逐切，入屋，心。］
竹、木长直貌。参见“橚矗”。
[②]［xiāo］
［《廣韻》蘇彫切，平蕭，心。］
见“橚2槮”。
[③]［qiū］
［《集韻》雌由切，平尤，清。］
木名。即楸。

橚字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　橚； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页554第02
【唐韻】息逐切【集韻】息六切【韻會】蘇谷切，?音肅。長木貌。【左思·蜀都賦】橚矗森萃。【李善註】橚矗，長直貌。【張衡·西京賦】橚?橚槮。【李善註】皆草木盛貌也。　又【廣韻】蘇彫切，音蕭。又【說文】山巧切，梢上聲。義?同。　又【集韻】與楸同。木名也。【山海經】華陽之山，其隂多苦辛，其狀如橚，其實如瓜，食之已瘧。【註】橚卽楸字。　又【集韻】同櫹。

橚字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
橚字的起名意思

指草木茂盛，树木高，也指楸树。

Basic explanation of words
Bright
sù
〔橚爽〕The vegetation is lush.
The trees are tall: "It's tall and luxuriant, and it's bleak and bleak."
Bright
qiū
The ancient same "catalpa", catalpa tree.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［sù］
["Guangyun" cuts into the house, heart. ]
Bamboo and wood are long and straight. See "Chu".
[②]［xiāo］
["Guangyun" Su Diaoqie, Pingxiao, Heart. ]
See "橚2槮".
[③]［qiū］
["Jiyun" Feiyouqie, Pingyou, Qing. ]
Wooden name. That is Catalpa.

[Tang Yun] Exhaust and cuts [Jiyun] Exhaust and six cuts [Yunhui] Su Guqie,? Yin Su. Long wood appearance. [Zuo Si·Shu Du Fu] Shu Chu Sen Cui. [Li Shan's Note] tall, long and straight. [Zhang Heng·Xijing Fu] 橚? 橚槮. [Li Shan's Note] They are all beautiful and beautiful.　[Guangyun] Su Diaoqie, sound Xiao. [Said the text] Shan Qiao cut, and sounded. Righteous? Same.　[Jiyun] is the same as 楸. Wood name also. [Shanhaijing] The mountain of Huayang has a lot of bitterness and bitterness, and its shape is like a mellow, but in fact it is like a melon. Name meaning
Refers to the lush vegetation and high trees, and also refers to the catalpa tree.
sù
сущ. вм. 楸 (бот. малотус японский)
